name: Fall Out
description:
Hi, my name is Fabien COAT and I'm a student video game developer based at Montpellier, France .

Fall Out is a fun multiplayer versus game where each of the two players control a Robot and have to avoid falling to the ground!

To achieve this, each one of them have their swinging aerial platform sustained by drones they can control.

If nearby, the player can punch or grab and throw their oponent. They can also interact with their flying arsenal to move it,fire some flaming cannonballs, unwrap a useful retractable bridge. 

I made this game alone in less than 2 months using Unity3D as engine, Maya for 3D, and C# for code. I used assets for the sound, and I mixed assets for particles.
